post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
Hello Members;

This is to inform you that Toronto YMCA is offering a session on how to write

a resume and a cover letter.


To reserve a seat, please call 416-538-9412.

F.Y.I.

  When       :  6 P.M. June 28 (Thursday), 2001

  Where      :  Plamerston Library at 560 Palmerston Ave. Toronto ( Near Bathurst Subway station )

  Instructor :  Mr. Han (Trust Fund Accountant at U of T )
post.title: [2001/06/19] Toronto YMCA offers a session.... (작성자: COSKA Education Team)
